home.seo.title: Affordable eSim data in 130+ destinatations
home.seo.description: Stay connected in 130+ destinations with our eSim data plans. eSimCandy is the best way to get connected in your destination.
location.seo.title: {locationName} eSim from, {price} - {networkType} Speed
location.seo.description: Stay connected in {locationName} with our eSim data plans. eSimCandy is the best way to get connected in your destination.
location.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
location.faq.description: Everything you need to know about your eSIM
location.faq.answer_1: Yes! eSIM is working perfectly in {locationName}. You can check out our eSIM data plans and buy them now!
location.faq.question_2: Can I make calls with eSIM in {locationName}?
location.faq.answer_2: No, you can't make calls with eSIM in {locationName}. You need to have an active data plan to make calls.
location.faq.question_3: How long does it take to get an eSIM in {locationName}?
location.faq.answer_3: The whole activation process takes less than 3 minutes!
location.faq.question_4: Will eSIM in  {locationName} work on my phone?
location.faq.answer_4: You can check out our device compatibility table to find out if your device is compatible with eSIM in {locationName}.
location.faq.answer_5: Yes! You can easily hotspot from your phone to connect your laptop or tablets at no extra cost
location.faq.question_6: Can I delete the {locationName} eSIM when I no-longer need it?
location.faq.answer_6: Yes! You can easily delete the eSIM from your phone without any help from us.
location.faq.question_7: Will I pay roaming charges while using eSIM in {locationName}?
location.faq.answer_7: No! You just need to disable the connection with your home SIM number and star using the eSIM in {locationName} then you won't be charged.
location.why_candy.title: Why choose an eSIM from Candy in {locationName}?
location.why_candy.description: Everything you need to know about your eSIM
location.why_candy.description_1: Don't worry about massive bills when you go back home. With eSIM Candy you know exactly how much the internet will cost you.
location.why_candy.description_2: Activate your eSIM in 3 minutes and connect automatically when you land in your destination. No complex configuration required.
location.why_candy.feature_3: Hotspot and connect all your devices
location.why_candy.description_3: Not just for your phone, hotspot to your laptop, tablet and enjoy connection on the bigger screen.
location.how_to_use_candy.title: How to use eSIM Candy in {locationName}?
location.how_to_use_candy.description: Here is how to start using the candy eSim in {locationName}
location.how_to_use_candy.step_1.title: Choose an eSim plan
location.how_to_use_candy.step_1.descrip: Choose a plan that suits your data need.
location.how_to_use_candy.step_2.title: Install your eSim
location.how_to_use_candy.step_2.descrip: Simply click to install on your iPhone, coming soon to Android. Or scan the QR code. No app download needed.
location.how_to_use_candy.step_3.title: Activate your eSim
location.how_to_use_candy.step_3.descrip: Follow the instructions to activate your eSim.
home.how_to_use_candy.title: How it works
home.features.title: Why use an eSIM?
home.features.subtitle: Simplify your travel experience with eSIM Candy
home.features.feature1.title: Forget Roaming
home.features.feature1.description: With eSIM Candy you know exactly how much the internet will cost you during your travels. No more unpleasant surprises when you go back home.
home.features.feature2.title: Instant activation
home.features.feature2.description: You don't need to wait in line at the airport. No more boring queues. Activate your eSIM in 3 minutes and connect automatically when you land in your destination.
home.features.feature3.title: Hotspot everywhere
home.features.feature3.description: Don't worry if wherever you go have WIFI or not. Hotspot to your laptop, tablet and enjoy connection on the bigger screen.
home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.description: Everything you need to know about your eSIM
home.faq.question_1: Is it easy to setup eSIM?
home.faq.answer_1: Yes! Setting up eSIM on your phone is so simple. It will take you less than 5 mins.
home.faq.question_2: Can I make calls with eSIM?
home.faq.answer_2: Yes! You can make call with VOIP apps. GSM calls are not supported.
home.faq.question_3: Is the eSIM compatible with my phone?
home.faq.answer_3: Yes! If you have a modern phone, it will work with eSIM. You can check the list of supported devices.
home.faq.answer_4: Yes! Your eSIM supports hotspot. You can always connect your laptop or tablets at no extra cost.
home.faq.question_5: Will I pay roaming charges while using eSIM?
home.faq.answer_5: No! You just need to disable the connection with your home SIM number and star using the eSIM in {locationName} then you won't be charged.
